description: Details of depth and type of piling and methodology including mitigation measures pursuant to condition 15 of planning permission ref: 232955FUL dated 02/04/2024 for: Construction of a two storey building, with habitable loft space and basement level, to accommodate 7 self-contained flats and provision of associated amenity space, cycle storage and refuse storage. (Following demolition of existing building)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The decision to refuse the details of the depth and type of piling and methodology including mitigation measures pursuant to condition 15 of planning permission ref: 232955FUL dated 02/04/2024  for: Construction of a two storey building, with habitable loft space and basement level, to accommodate 7 self-contained flats and provision of associated amenity space, cycle storage and refuse storage (Following demolition of existing building) has been taken having regard to Policy SI 5 of the London Plan (2021)

Thames Water has reviewed the submission and confirmed it does not meet the requirements of the condition. Council Officers attempted to contact the applicant with no response received. The applicant is instructed to address the matters raised in Informative 1 , and resubmit an application for consideration.
